Island_FirstParrot.name: Ginger Island North
Island_FirstParrot.description: Unlock access to the north side of the island

Island_Turtle.name: Ginger Island West
Island_Turtle.description: Unlock access to the west side of the island

Island_UpgradeHouse.name: Ginger Island Farmhouse
Island_UpgradeHouse.description: Unlock the Farmhouse on the west side of the island, which can be used to sleep in to pass the day without leaving the island

Island_UpgradeHouse_Mailbox.name: Farmhouse Mailbox
Island_UpgradeHouse_Mailbox.description: Allow players to access their mail without leaving the island

Island_W_Obelisk.name: Farm Obelisk
Island_W_Obelisk.description: Allow players to teleport back to the farm, similar to a warp totem

Island_UpgradeBridge.name: Island Dig Site
Island_UpgradeBridge.description: Repair the bridge to access the island dig site

Island_VolcanoBridge.name: Volcano Bridge
Island_VolcanoBridge.description: Unlock a permanent bridge into the volcano so that players no longer have to have their watering can to get in

Island_VolcanoShortcutOut.name: Volcano Exit Shortcut
Island_VolcanoShortcutOut.description: Unlock an escape shortcut from level 5 of the Volcano Dungeon, allowing quick access to Island North

Island_Resort.name: Island Resort
Island_Resort.description: Unlock a beach resort. NPCs from the town will occasionally come to visit the resort. This also unlocks Island Southeast and the Pirate Cove

Island_UpgradeParrotPlatform.name: Parrot Express
Island_UpgradeParrotPlatform.description: Unlock a fast travel system to quickly get around the island
